name: 陳冠薇
objective:
這門課是開設給大一港澳生與僑生修讀的國文專班，這學期擬嘗試發展為 USR 課程，帶領學生走出課室，更深刻地「認識台灣」，並透過期末成果的實作（1. 介紹礦工故事給自己家鄉的朋友 2. 介紹自己家鄉的勞動者故事給台灣同學），達到增強學生語文能力、促進文化交流，以及國際宣傳的效果。

This course is a special Chinese class for first-year students from Hong Kong, Macao and overseas Chinese. This semester plans to try to develop it into a USR course, leading students to go out of the classroom to "understand Taiwan" more deeply, and through the practice of the final results (1. Introduce the stories of the miners to friends in their hometown 2. Introduce the stories of the laborers in their hometown to Taiwanese students), to achieve the effect of enhancing students' language ability, promoting cultural exchanges, and international publicity.
